mapper.select: select mc.mbr_coupn_id, mc.vld_start_dt, mc.vld_end_dt, ci.name, ci.val, ci.max_prc, ci.use_base_prc from tb_member_coupon mc,tb_coupon_issue ci where mc.mbr_id = #{mbrId} and mc.coupn_issu_cd = ci.coupn_issu_cd
select ci.val, if(ci.max_prc is null , ci.val, ci.max_prc) as max_prc from tb_member_coupon mc,tb_coupon_issue ci where mc.mbr_coupn_id = #{mbrCoupnId} and mc.coupn_issu_cd = ci.coupn_issu_cd
